name: BBW Cards
description:
How to play: 

Lef Click on any card to use it. 

Right Click on any card to shuffle all cards(This will remove one card)

------------------------------------------------------

In order to win you need to reach 75 tiles. If you run out of cards you will lose.

------------------------------------------------------

Move Cards: Moves the player one tile, can't land on a tile with an obstacle.

Jump Cards: Moves the player two tiles, Can jump over one obstacle. Can't Land on an obstacle

Attack Cards: Can only be used if there is an obstacle on the tiles directly in front of the player. Will destroy the tile and replace it with normal tile.
